description:
Noa displays the power of his virtual world by splitting up Yugi’s gang and flinging them into the far reaches of his self-created universe!  The first to duel under the all-new Deck Master System is Yugi against Big 1 Gansley’s Deepsea Warrior!  Can Yugi master the complex new rules, or will the rules master him?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: デッキマスター深海の戦士
